globalAttributes.name: minlength
globalAttributes.description: Defines the minimum number of characters allowed in the element

globalAttributes.name: maxlength
globalAttributes.description: Defines the maximum number of characters allowed in the element

globalAttributes.name: pattern
globalAttributes.description: Defines a regular expression that the element's value is checked against

globalAttributes.name: required
globalAttributes.description: Indicates that the element must be filled out before submitting the form

globalAttributes.name: autocomplete
globalAttributes.description: Indicates whether input fields should have autocomplete enabled

globalAttributes.name: loading
globalAttributes.description: Indicates how the browser should load the resource

globalAttributes.name: decoding
globalAttributes.description: Provides an image decoding hint to the browser

globalAttributes.name: fetchpriority
globalAttributes.description: Provides a hint of the relative priority to use when fetching the resource

globalAttributes.name: crossorigin
globalAttributes.description: Indicates whether CORS must be used when fetching the resource

globalAttributes.name: referrerpolicy
globalAttributes.description: Indicates which referrer to send when fetching the resource

globalAttributes.name: integrity
globalAttributes.description: Allows the browser to verify the fetched resource to ensure it hasn't been manipulated

globalAttributes.name: nonce
globalAttributes.description: A cryptographic nonce used by Content Security Policy

globalAttributes.name: inputmode
globalAttributes.description: Provides a hint to browsers about the type of virtual keyboard to display

globalAttributes.name: enterkeyhint
globalAttributes.description: Defines what action label to present for the enter key on virtual keyboards

globalAttributes.name: spellcheck
globalAttributes.description: Indicates whether spell checking is allowed for the element

globalAttributes.name: translate
globalAttributes.description: Specifies whether an element's text content should be translated

globalAttributes.name: role
globalAttributes.description: ARIA role for accessibility

globalAttributes.name: aria-label
globalAttributes.description: Defines a string value that labels the current element

globalAttributes.name: aria-labelledby
globalAttributes.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that labels the current element

globalAttributes.name: aria-describedby
globalAttributes.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that describes the current element

globalAttributes.name: aria-hidden
globalAttributes.description: Indicates that the element and its descendants will not be visible or perceivable to users

globalAttributes.name: aria-live
globalAttributes.description: Indicates that an element will be updated, and describes the types of updates

globalAttributes.name: aria-expanded
globalAttributes.description: Indicates if the element is expanded or collapsed

globalAttributes.name: aria-current
globalAttributes.description: Indicates the element that represents the current item within a container or set of related elements

globalAttributes.name: part
globalAttributes.description: The part attribute for CSS Shadow Parts

globalAttributes.name: slot
globalAttributes.description: Assigns a slot in a shadow DOM tree to an element

globalAttributes.name: is
globalAttributes.description: Specifies that a standard HTML element should behave like a custom built-in element

globalAttributes.name: itemscope
globalAttributes.description: Creates a new item for structured data

globalAttributes.name: itemtype
globalAttributes.description: Specifies the URL of the vocabulary for structured data

globalAttributes.name: itemprop
globalAttributes.description: Adds a property to a structured data item

globalAttributes.name: itemid
globalAttributes.description: The unique identifier of the item for structured data

globalAttributes.name: itemref
globalAttributes.description: References other elements to include in structured data
